u.a: <1w> looks at Mandy . <1w> looks at book
looks at book . shakes head . slight smile
<1w> smiles . looks at Mandy . looks at book .
shy look . looks at Investigator , at book
takes pacifier out of Mandy's mouth holds pacifier in mouth
looks at Mandy smiles . looks in the distance , at book
<1w> outlines with index finger on page
<1w> leans close to Mandy . grabs page . <1w> turns page .
<1w> looks at book . looks at Mandy's hand , at book
glances at book . smiles at Mandy
points with finger to book . smiles
<bef> gestures toward book . <dur> smiles at book . <aft> looks at book
looks at book when Mandy looks at book
<1w> turns page . fiddles with glued page
<bef> turns toward book . <aft> holds pacifier in mouth
<bef> attempts to take pacifier out of Mandy's mouth
speaks in a teasing tone in a higher pitch
<1w> pats Mandy on the bottom . holds book
lying prone with head near Mother's lap , then on Mother's lap
<1w> attempts to remove pacifier from Mandy's mouth .
looks at Mandy . points to book
smiles . looks at book . slightly nods . looks at Mandy
<bef> looks at book . points to book . smiles at book and Mother
pulls pacifier out of Mandy's mouth and puts it down . continues to rub Mandy's back
<bef> looks at book . <dur> looks at Mother . smiles . <aft> looks at book
<aft> sits up next to Mother . grabs pacifier and puts in mouth
<aft> looks at Mother , at book . smiles at Mother
<bef> rubs Mandy's head . <dur> rubs Mandy's back
